title: Ja Morant On His Controversial Celebration After Memphis Grizzlies Win - BlackSportsOnline
text: Ja Morant is in the news again over his controversial celebration following another Memphis Grizzlies win. He‚Äôs been blasted on the internet for his celebration which people interpreted as firing guns. You know he‚Äôs been caught up in some gun stuff in the past and this celebration is being linked to firing or portraying guns. [READ ALSO: Dak Prescott‚Äôs Ex-Girlfriend Natalie Buffett Has Moved On And Now Is With MLB Pitcher Jack Flaherty](https://blacksportsonline.com/2023/12/dak-prescotts-ex-girlfriend-natalie-buffett-has-moved-on-and-now-is-with-mlb-pitcher-jack-flaherty/) But according to Morant, the celebration was a ‚ÄòRock Ya Hips‚Äô dance and not firing guns as it‚Äôs been speculated out there. [Morant](https://nypost.com/2023/12/27/sports/ja-morant-taking-heat-in-grizzlies-celebration-controversy/?utm_campaign=nypost_sports&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter&sr_share=twitter) reposted a video on X that compiled clips of LSU football players unveiling similar dances while celebrating touchdowns, with some users suggesting perhaps Morant used it because the Grizzlies were playing in New Orleans. But others countered by criticizing Morant for unveiling anything that even resembled ‚Äî or could‚Äôve been confused for ‚Äî finger guns, given that he‚Äôd just returned from a 25-game suspension for flashing a handgun on Instagram Live for a second time. Ja Morant pulled out that BR cell [https://t.co/IF5379EDg9] [pic.twitter.com/25Kdw6u8hE] ‚Äî Racqy Balboa ‚ù§Ô∏èüç® (@RacqyDaRuler) [December 27, 2023] ‚ÄúThe optics of ja morant own employer promoting the flashing of gun hand motions after coming back from a 25 game suspension is insane,‚Äù one user wrote on X. The exact optics and context behind his dance remain unclear, and the Grizzlies‚Äô team account even shared a clip on social media. It was just a dance, but Morant has to know he is under an extremely spotlight, so he has to take everything under consideration. Flip to the next page for reactions‚Ä¶
